channel.title: Error
channel.description:
trading works fine for normal players but i was wondering how to enable it for mods and admins.
thanks.

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @flyer flyer
item.description:
@flyer wrote:

i have found out that it isnt that it is the fact thati thinks it the delta anti leech but uhm… i dont intend on leeching i mean it was a F2PPking server im trying to make it a normal server pking skilling ect. so im not trying to leech i dont intend to release anything to download of such but under public void tradereq it says (this is only the one line i think i need to change):
if(!playername.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dan”) && !other.playername.equalsignorecase(“Dan”)){
now this is from what i gather only the user dan can trade now i was wonder is there a way to code the java so it automatically detect the players name to fill it into there?

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @pl0x15 pl0x15
item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

Someone post after me and tell me if this is correct if it isn’t im sorry.

You’re problem should be solved by something like this…

Go to client.java and click edit then click find. As keyword type Trade.
Once you keep pressing enter until you find what you need which will say something involving admins n mods. it should either say playerRights >= (then the number) meaning that only that right can trade… 1 mod 2 admin 3 owner and 0=regplayer. Put it as a 0.
but if it says sumthing similar to this,
Modtrade=false/true (you put true)

Same for admin… sorry if this is incorrect ima look thru my client.java files n get u a real tut:)

Read full topic
